extendedInfo.description: Watch over 25,000 episodes and 15,000 hours of latest and hottest Anime & Asian Drama 1 hour after TV broadcast! Catch the hottest shows like Naruto Shippuden, Attack on Titan, Gargantia, Sword Art Online, Bleach, Shugo Chara, Blue Exorcist, Gintama, Fate/Zero, Hunter X Hunter, Toradora, and more.Crunchyroll offers both FREE (no membership required) and premium service.With Premium membership:- Watch newest episodes 1-hour after airing in Japan- No ads- Watch over 3G and 4G network- Access HD and DVD quality videos (On our website, crunchyroll.com)Get the app today!Crunchyroll licenses all its content directly and legally to bring you the best and most recent shows from Asia and support the content creators.

reviews.title: This app could be better
reviews.comment: I really hope they are working on an update for this app, and can finally add automatic screen rotation once inside the app.     Update: Even after the updates, still no screen rotation. But I\'m glad they are at least updating the app.  Increased my rating a bit.  Suggestion: Please provide support for the Chromecast as well. Would be a nice addition to the Crunchyroll app.
reviews.author: David Anicama

reviews.comment: This app is great for you if you love anime and are okay with tons of adds ^\302\260^ :)\tWonderful app! It\'s amazing, just needs a lil less adds.. I get that their trying to get people to pay for \"add free streaming\" but I deleted this app because their getting more and more adds! :( love it but too mamy comercials!
reviews.author: Howard Huihui

reviews.title: The update sucks
reviews.comment: I loved waching on my phone. But every update you put more ads get put on. stop doing that put it in the beginning of all of the show .don\'t make it so that onl premium doesn\'t get cut of there shows you now suck.
reviews.author: Jemima Malote

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It works very well. The only issue I\'ve seen is when upgrading to premium, you have to log out and log back in. So happy this exists.
reviews.author: Robert Pollum

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Love Naruto love Say I Love You, I JUST LOVE IT!
reviews.author: Lourdes Guevara

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Ive been a subscriber of crunchyroll for a few months. A great place to watch anime not already released in the US. Also a great place to watch new animes as they are released. If you really want to watch english dubs people, then this is not the place for you, this is where true anime fans gather!
reviews.author: Nicholas Griffin

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Works great... Save for recently where the history and query forgetting what I watched and where I\'m at in whatever show. Still great though. Support these guys if you can. The service provided is great and still cheap. And more support means more shows.
reviews.author: Andrew Schaffer

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: I love this app but it won\'t let me watch no more videos of Naruto. Please fix and Ill go to 5 stars
reviews.author: Eric Javier

reviews.title: No search button
reviews.comment: The updates should put a search button so we should be able to find the anime we wanna watch..Im complaining because I can\'t find a lot of anime that I wanna watch T.T
reviews.author: sawada tsunayoshi

reviews.title: No English episodes of S.A.O
reviews.comment: No English episodes of that cartoon. Don\'t feel like reading and I can\'t understand Japanese.
reviews.author: Dedrick Jones

reviews.title: Good app. Could be great
reviews.comment: Wish you could play a video and have it stream to a tv like the YouTube app. Would also be nice to have a next option, some times when you watch a video the next one doesn\'t show on the queue.
reviews.author: Amner frias

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I really like this app. It plays a lot of the anime shows I like in HD. Just wish there would be a little less ads. Just a little. Plz
reviews.author: Gabriel Swanson

reviews.title: Apps good but...
reviews.comment: I like the app and has all the anime I watch. I don\'t mind the ads but what\'s with the app going back to the Crunchyroll home, after like 5 minutes into an episode? That sucks a lot. Please fix.
reviews.author: Aymee Guerra

reviews.title: HELP!
reviews.comment: So i can watch the first half of any anime but when it gets to the middle it blacks out and says problem loading im not sure if this is because i am on a asus memo but plz fix this!!!
reviews.author: Jarrod Fitzgerald

reviews.title: Good enough :)
reviews.comment: It\'s nice but there\'s only a limited choices of anime ep. Also, there\'s no search button or anything like it.  Please, the anime eps. that i really like to watch are not here.  Though while watching, there\'s no problem to it. It surely is HD or high quality. And i don\'t mind the ads, really. ;) Just the varieties of anime eps.
reviews.author: Yean Ju

reviews.title: This is a must for any anime addict
reviews.comment: Buy it now but expect to spend exorbitant amounts of time watching anime after you get it.
reviews.author: Mark Hoener

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: To many freaken ads only put one ad in please there are just way to many ads please only one ad per video please also some  of the video don\'t work
reviews.author: kyeon boatwright

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: Since the new update there is now an ad every 5 mins throughout the shows. Will be deleting because i just wont tolerate such nonsense especially when its the same add over and over again.
reviews.author: Samuel Coria

reviews.title: No way
reviews.comment: There is no way I\'m paying a fee just to watch one episode!! I came here for FREE anime. Needing a membership with a monthly fee is not free
reviews.author: Yuki Takana

reviews.title: fine when working
reviews.comment: more often than not is not working, always asking for error reports they never obviously bother to sort out, and if your a premium member like me it means nothing to them. dnt waste your time with this, all they want is your \302\2435 a month to npt supply you with something that works often enough to make it worth it.
reviews.author: Ashley Hawkins
